de.cocolab.reuse
Class Sort

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--de.cocolab.reuse.Sort
public class Sort
extends java.lang.Object

Utility class for sorting arrays of objects.

This class performs the same sorting function as you find in the java.util.Arrays introduced in JDK 1.2. We repeat the functionality here in order to allow Cocktail to be used on earlier platforms.

Could be put into General.

Version:
$Id: $

Method Detail

sort

public static void sort(Comparable[] array,
                        int lwb,
                        int upb)
Sort a part of a one dimensional array.

Parameters:
array - An array of Comparable objects. This will be sorted into ascending sequence.

lwb - The lower bound (inclusive) of the elements to be sorted.

upb - The upper bound (inclusive) of the elements to be sorted.
